channel.title: CVE Feed for openSUSE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for openSUSE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22643|2023-02-07T00:00:00 -- opensuse -- opensuse%20leap%2015.4
item.description: An Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in libzypp-plugin-appdata of SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP 15-SP3; openSUSE Leap 15.4 allows attackers that can trick users to use specially crafted REPO_ALIAS, REPO_TYPE or REPO_METADATA_PATH settings to execute code as root. This issue affects: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP 15-SP3 libzypp-plugin-appdata versions prior to 1.0.1+git.20180426. openSUSE Leap 15.4 libzypp-plugin-appdata versions prior to 1.0.1+git.20180426.

item.title: CVE-2023-22652|2023-06-01T11:51:15.111Z -- opensuse -- libeconf
item.description: A Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in openSUSE libeconf leads to DoS via malformed config files. This issue affects libeconf: before 0.5.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-32183|2023-07-07T08:12:28.190Z -- opensuse -- tumbleweed
item.description: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in the openSUSE Tumbleweed hawk2 package allows users with access to the hacluster to escalate to root This issue affects openSUSE Tumbleweed.

item.title: CVE-2023-32184|2023-09-19T09:42:48.052Z -- opensuse -- opensuse-welcome
item.description: A Insecure Storage of Sensitive Information vulnerability in openSUSE opensuse-welcome allows local attackers to execute code as the user that runs opensuse-welcome if a custom layout is chosen This issue affects opensuse-welcome: from 0.1 before 0.1.9+git.35.4b9444a.

item.title: CVE-2023-32181|2023-06-01T11:46:03.028Z -- opensuse -- libeconf
item.description: A Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in openSUSE libeconf allows for DoS via malformed configuration files This issue affects libeconf: before 0.5.2.
